ultimate.name: Wild Duel
ultimate.description: Lenya targets the enemy who has dealt the highest cumulative damage and dashes at them, delivering a flying kick that deals 200% damage and knocks them back in a straight line toward an open area. She then follows up with a second flying kick, dealing 200% damage, before initiating a duel with that enemy. The duel lasts for 12s, during which both Lenya and the enemy prioritize attacking each other. Kenya's flying kick can stun the enemy for 2 seconds, and she is Unaffected while performing the kicks.

upgrades.upgrade: Lenya increases her flying kick's damage to 210%.
Lenya increases her flying kick's damage to 220%.
Lenya increases her flying kick's damage to 230%.
Lenya increases her flying kick's damage to 240%.

skill_1.name: Tornado Strike
skill_1.description:
Passive - Lenya blocks a normal attack from her current target if the target is within 1 tile. She then retaliates with a kick that deals 260% damage and stuns the target for 2s. The effect can be triggered once every 6s and makes Lenya Unaffected while active.

Active - Lenya performs a tornado kick, dealing 110% damage 3 times to surrounding enemies.

skill_2.name: Flurry Kicks
skill_2.description: Lenya increases her Crit by 15. When dealing critical damage with her normal attacks, she immediately follows up with a power kick that deals 200% damage and stuns the enemy for 1s.

upgrades.upgrade: Lenya increases her power kick's damage to 210%.
Lenya increases her power kick's damage to 230%.
Lenya increases her power kick's damage to 240%.

ex_skill.name: Winning Resolve
ex_skill.description: Lenya unlocks her full potential once a duel begins, increasing her Crit DMG Boost by 55 and ATK by 15% during the duel. While at full potential, her Flurry Kicks skill delivers a superkick instead of a power kick, dealing 70% damage 8 times and stunning the enemy for 2s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases Crit DMG Boost by 60 and ATK by 18%.
If Lenya deals more damage than her target by the end of the duel, she is considered the winner. Winning the duel increases the duration her full potential effects by 8s.
Increases Crit DMG Boost by 65 and ATK by 20%

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Reduces damage taken from enemies other than her target by 35%.

season_skill.name: Battle Rush
season_skill.description: Increases own Haste by 21 for 10s after each Ultimate cast.
